channel.title: Home on Azat's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Azat's Blog

item.title: Blog Setup
item.description: Framework: Hugo Theme: hugo-xmin (modified) Deployed on: Vercel (free) Domain: Namecheap ($5/year)

item.title: Vim Setup for Front-End Development
item.description: VIM: Vi IMproved 8.1 Config: .vimrc Plugin manager: vim-plug Color scheme: vim-code-dark Status bar: vim-airline, vim-airline-themes (deus) Terminal font: Fira Mono for Powerline Syntax highlighting: vim-javascript, vim-jsx-pretty Autocompletion, LSP, formatting, etc: coc.nvim, coc-tsserver, coc-eslint, coc-prettier Other: fzf.vim, vim-fugitive

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Azat. I am a front-end developer. I love using and building cool stuff.
